attributes.action: Raise awerness of the proposed closure of the "Vale Wildlife Rescue Centre"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The "Vale Wildlife Rescue Centre" may be closing down because of lack of funds. this centre has saved the lives of injured, premature and dying animals. they work hard to save the lives of many animals from bunnies to foxes and crows to cats. They are heros!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
